channel.title: Hamachi Help
channel.description:
Okay again.....
im using Hamachi...
im using Pimpscape everything is up but people cant join server, My Port is forwarded I believe even have it as HTTP and FTP instead of blank Please someone help me...
If you need me MY Hamachi Network is
Dcen and Atl pass is joinus
OTHER INFO:
i went into firewall and opened zones and added my hamachi server ip to it as a Trusted zone do you think people would be able to connect now?
thank you for your help.

item.title: Hamachi Help
item.dc:creator: @Dcen Dcen

@Dcen wrote:

okay im using Ez Trust Firewall idk where to find exceptions on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi Help
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

go to firewall, go to exceptions, add port, make 1 for tcp and udp or w/e the’re called. should work then

Read full topic
